name: crdt-benchmarks
description: CRDT benchmarks, forked from Kevin Jahns's https://github.com/dmonad/crdt-benchmarks

scripts.start: npm start -w benchmarks/yjs && npm start -w benchmarks/automerge-wasm && npm start -w benchmarks/fugue && npm start -w benchmarks/fugue-simple && npm start -w benchmarks/fugue-max-simple
scripts.table: node bin/render-table.js benchmarks/results.json 6000 yjs automerge-wasm fugue fugue-simple fugue-max-simple
scripts.B4x100: npm run B4x100 -w benchmarks/yjs && npm run B4x100 -w benchmarks/fugue
